raw:
*

Tree Controller
* *General idea*
* The tree controller is the controller made for the {@link qx.ui.tree.Tree}
* widget in qooxdoo. Therefore, it is responsible for creating and adding the
* tree folders to the tree given as target.
* *Features*
* * Synchronize the model and the target
* * Label and icon are bindable
* * Takes care of the selection
* * Passes on the options used by {@link qx.data.SingleValueBinding#bind}
* *Usage*
* As model, you can use every qooxdoo widget structure having one property,
* which is a data array holding the children of the current node. There can
* be as many additional as you like.
* You need to specify a model, a target, a child path and a label path to
* make the controller work.
* *Cross reference*
* * If you want to bind single values, use {@link qx.data.controller.Object}
* * If you want to bind a list like widget, use {@link qx.data.controller.List}
* * If you want to bin a form widget, use {@link qx.data.controller.Form}

@description.name: @description
@description.body:
Tree Controller

General idea The tree controller is the controller made for the {@link qx.ui.tree.Tree} widget in qooxdoo. Therefore, it is responsible for creating and adding the tree folders to the tree given as target. Features

  • Synchronize the model and the target
  • Label and icon are bindable
  • Takes care of the selection
  • Passes on the options used by {@link qx.data.SingleValueBinding#bind} Usage As model, you can use every qooxdoo widget structure having one property, which is a data array holding the children of the current node. There can be as many additional as you like. You need to specify a model, a target, a child path and a label path to make the controller work. Cross reference
  • If you want to bind single values, use {@link qx.data.controller.Object}
  • If you want to bind a list like widget, use {@link qx.data.controller.List}
  • If you want to bin a form widget, use {@link qx.data.controller.Form}

raw: * Helper method for binding a given property from the model to the target
* widget.
* This method should only be called in the
* {@link qx.data.controller.IControllerDelegate#bindItem} function
* implemented by the {@link #delegate} property.
* @param sourcePath {String | null} The path to the property in the model.
*   If you use an empty string, the whole model item will be bound.
* @param targetPath {String} The name of the property in the target
*   widget.
* @param options {Map | null} The options to use by
*  {@link qx.data.SingleValueBinding#bind} for the binding.
* @param targetWidget {qx.ui.tree.core.AbstractTreeItem} The target widget.
* @param modelNode {var} The model node which should be bound to the target.

@description.body: Helper method for binding a given property from the model to the target widget. This method should only be called in the {@link qx.data.controller.IControllerDelegate#bindItem} function implemented by the {@link #delegate} property.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
sourcePath {String | null} The path to the property in the model.
   If you use an empty string, the whole model item will be bound.
@param.description:
The path to the property in the model.
   If you use an empty string, the whole model item will be bound.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
targetPath {String} The name of the property in the target

@param.description:
The name of the property in the target
   widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body:
options {Map | null} The options to use by
  {@link qx.data.SingleValueBinding#bind} for the binding.
@param.description:
The options to use by
  {@link qx.data.SingleValueBinding#bind} for the binding.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: targetWidget {qx.ui.tree.core.AbstractTreeItem} The target widget.
@param.description: The target widget.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: modelNode {var} The model node which should be bound to the target.
@param.description: The model node which should be bound to the target.
